text: Mna Wayahudi wandaga wawaonelega gaina wakina Paulo na miyawe sila, wawaduganyaga want'hu wahezi heweina ndima, mwe zisila, niyo watenda kafyo, niyo wawagamba wadamanye fyo mo mzi wose vileke waitahe nyumba ya mnt'hu yumwenga akwitangwa Yasoni, enga mzungu wa kuwapata Paulo na Sila, na kuwegala kwa want'hu ao.
